name: City of Heroes
notes:
When run for the first  time it will ask for an install directory.  You can use what is selected by default.

The Tequila client may have issues downloading some of the other software it can run like paragon chat.  This will prevent the play button from appearing.  You can by pass that by just double clicking on Homecoming in the navbar to load the game.

After loading the game you might need to hit "Alt-Enter" to change to windowed mode as the resolution may not be supported.
content:
files:
- client: http://patch.savecoh.com/tequila.exe
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Games/CoH/tequila.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet35
    description: Installing MS .NET 3.5
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: dotnet35sp1
    description: Installing MS .NET 3.5 SP1
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- execute:
    command: mkdir -p "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Games/CoH"
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Games/CoH/tequila.exe
    src: client
